quote: The most serious drawback to the telling-nothing approach is that it made that much more of a mystery of what had happened, and the nature of gossip abhors a vacuum of the unexplained.
quote_letters: THE MOST SERIOUS DRAWBACK TO THE TELLING-NOTHING APPROACH IS THAT IT MADE THAT MUCH MORE OF A MYSTERY OF WHAT HAD HAPPENED AND THE NATURE OF GOSSIP ABHORS A VACUUM OF THE UNEXPLAINED
